statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -6 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -6 \\ -1 \\ 8 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 7 \\ 3 \\ -16 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -6 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 4 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -6 \\ -1 \\ 8 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 7 \\ 3 \\ -16 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
